d:
This is a re-write of the Spanish translation of this comic. Since the original comic hasn't been updated for some time I've taken the project on for the past few weeks. Hope you enjoy!

Special Thanks to Cretino for the original Spanish translation & Idefirka for uploading the original English translation.

Update 01/04/26 - Updated to page 420. Fixed some mis-translations from pages 412 - 416. Changed Akane's dialogue in pages 408-412.
n: [Non-H] [Pocchari wa sekai o sukuu] Chubby Girlfriend [English Re-Write]
